extendedInfo.description: Join Mickey on a brand new adventure in Disneyâs most popular mobile game franchise!â¢ âProvides funny and brainy puzzling for Mickey fans of all ages.â â USA Todayâ¢ âBlends classic Disney shorts, killer app gameplay.â â Wiredâ¢ âAmazing transitions and great stories that tie each episode together, making this installment truly shine.â â 148 Appsâ¢ âWhile the gameplay is as solid as ever, perhaps the true highlight of the game â versus its predecessors, at the very least â is the framing story around it. Or rather, stories.â â GamezeboWhere's My Mickey? introduces a whole new world of life-like physics-based gameplay with stimulating weather mechanics and humorous animations. Immerse yourself in the ultimate mobile gaming experience as you watch funny episodes while solving challenging puzzles! Tap, swipe, and swirl to help Mickey collect water and complete each story. Every drop counts!In this version, play 13+ challenging puzzles FOR FREE! Want more levels? Get the full version and play up to 100+ brain-teasing puzzles featuring Goofy, Pluto and more! Key Features in the Full Version:â¢ Original Episodes â Explore 5 unique episodes with surprising and witty scenarios! Watch how each story unfolds and ends as you play through individual level packs! Goofy episodes will require a small additional fee.â¢ Brand New Weather Mechanics â Use wind, clouds and rain to maneuver through 100+ levels filled with fun challenges!â¢ A Whole New Look â A classic Mickey art-style with a contemporary touch, inspired by Disney Channelâs new series of Mickey Cartoons!â¢ Collectibles and Bonus Levels â Help Pluto look for hidden collectibles to unlock more bonus puzzles!â¢ Featuring Mickey and Friends â Discover more hilarious episodes and new friends, beginning with Goofy!Now a sneak preview of the first episode â âWhen Life Gives You Lemonsâ:On a hot summer day, Mickey decides to open up a lemonade stand. Heâs got a bowl, the lemons, and a long line of thirsty customers, yet NO WATER! Help Mickey collect water and âtri-starâ each level for ultimate fun! Even the stars are animated!Visit www.facebook.com/WheresMyWater for more hints, tips and secrets.Terms of Use: http://disneytermsofuse.com/

reviews.title: Cute and fun
reviews.comment: This game has cute animations and a very funny story. Very enjoyable! Interesting yet relaxing puzzles. (:
reviews.author: Jeanette Choi

reviews.title: I love these games
reviews.comment: One of the best mind testing games, flexible solutions, lots of fun.  Keep making them!

reviews.title: Adorable and fun.
reviews.comment: Mickey is adorable, and the free version has 13 free levels, which is very reasonable for a trial. The levels get progressively harder so it\'s a nice, gradual challenge. Not too hard for kids but not too easy for adults.

reviews.title: Buggy, not up to standard
reviews.comment: I have the paid versions of Where\'s My Water?  & Where\'s My Perry?   This one isn\'t half as good.  On top of that, the interface is buggy... always trying to launch web pages or the play store.

reviews.title: Exciting games.
reviews.comment: I like the game. The story are quite funny for me. If I\'m still interested, I might buy the full version.
